channel.title: How can i make a requirements for a item?
channel.description: U know.. if i have an item ( rune 2h ) but u need 40 att to wear it but in my server players just wear it but they dont have attack 40 , how can i make requirements for the rune 2h ?[br][size=1]: October 06, 2007, 06:42:32 AM[/size][hr]Can some one help me please?

item.title: How can i make a requirements for a item?

item.description:
@system wrote:

yes but i have skillcapes in my server , and peoples are wearing a str cape and i am wanna set that u need lvl 99 str to wear it how can i do that?
